name: Balloons Stormin'
description:
Simple game where you fly an airplane and pop balloons. Unlock more powerful airplanes as you progress.

  • 30+ Unlockable Airplanes
  • 12 Distinct Level Templates
  • Infinite Levels

Inspired  by the minigame Bear Stormin' from the game Putt-Putt Goes to the Moon.

Controls:

  • W - Move Up
  • S - Move Down
  • P - Pause
